train-drag-another-pipe.content: Now, drag another pipe next to it.

win-right-amount-plants.content: You had the right amount of plants

fail-fish-food.content: Your fish didn't get enough food.

fail-need-more-fish.content: You needed more fish so their poop could help feed the plants.

fail-need-more-plants.content: You needed more plants to clean your fish's water.

fail-too-many-fish.content: You had too many fish, and the plants couldn't clean the water.

feedback-add-fish-1.content: Your farm needs more fish, to help your plants get the food they need.

feedback-add-fish-2.content: Add more fish, so your plants can have enough food!

feedback-add-plants-1.content: Your farm needs more plants, to help clean the fish's water.

feedback-add-plants-2.content: Add another row of pipes to grow more plants! The new plants will help clean your fish's water.

feedback-adding-fish-too-many.content: Uh oh, that's too many fish! The plants can't keep the water clean.

feedback-connect-pipes-1.content: Your pipes need to connect to the tank, so the plants and fish get the water they need.

feedback-connect-pipes-2.content: Connect your pipes to the tank!

feedback-edit-harvest.content: You need to fix your farm before you can pick your plants!

feedback-edit-idle-1.content: When you're done building, turn on your farm to KEEP GROWING your plants.

feedback-edit-idle-2.content: Turn on the water to test out your farm!

feedback-feed-fish.content: Time to feed the fish! They need food to be healthy!

feedback-grow-more-1.content: You need to grow more plants to feed the Fidgits. Can you add more pipes with plants to your farm?

feedback-grow-more-2.content: You need to grow more plants! Add a new row of pipes.

feedback-harvest-a.content: Some of your plants are ready to be picked.

feedback-harvest-b.content: Tap on all the big ones.

feedback-harvest-reminder.content: Tap on all the glowing plants to pick them!

feedback-remove-fish-1.content: Your farm has too many fish! The plants can't keep the water clean.

feedback-remove-fish-2.content: Take out some fish so the water will be cleaner.

feedback-remove-plants-1.content: You have too many plants for the fish to keep healthy.

feedback-remove-plants-2.content: Remove some plants, so they can have enough food!

feedback-small-changes-2.content: Make a small change and see what happens.

feedback-tank-crowded-1.content: Your farm has too many fish for a tank this size! They're getting crowded.

feedback-tank-crowded-2.content: You have too many fish for a tank this size! Take out some fish so they have enough space.

game-intro-1-mission.content: Your mission: Grow and pick plants to fill up the farm stand & feed the Fidgits!

game-intro-2-growplants.content: Did you know you can grow plants in pipes without using any dirt? It’s true – and it's better for the environment than regular farming!

game-intro-3a-withfish.content: How do you do that? With FISH!

game-intro-3b-fishpoop.content: The fish poop falls apart in the water. The plants use the very small parts of poop for food. This also cleans the water for the fish.

grew-enough-basil.content: You grew enough basil for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-carrots.content: You grew enough carrots for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-chard.content: You grew enough rainbow chard for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-cucumbers.content: You grew enough cucumbers for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-mint.content: You grew enough mint for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-peas.content: You grew enough snap peas for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-peppers.content: You grew enough hot peppers for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-spinach.content: You grew enough spinach for the Fidgits

grew-enough-strawberries.content: You grew enough strawberries for the Fidgits!

grew-enough-tomatoes.content: You grew enough tomatoes for the Fidgits!

menu-firsttime.content: Let's grow some mint plants for the Fidgits!

menu-returning.content: Choose which plant you'd like to grow!

menu-unlocked-basil.content: Now you can grow basil plants!

menu-unlocked-chard.content: Now you can grow rainbow chard plants!

menu-unlocked-peas.content: Now you can grow snap peas!

menu-unlocked-peppers.content: Now you can grow hot peppers!

menu-unlocked-spinach.content: Now you can grow spinach plants!

payoff-idle.content: Move the Fidgit to help her catch food.

train-drag-elbow.content: Drag over this elbow pipe to make a corner.

train-drag-fish.content: Now drag a fish into your tank. The fish’s poop will fall apart in the water, and then the plants will use small parts of the poop for food!

train-drag-pipe.content: Drag a pipe onto the board. Let's put it right here.

train-farmer-fidgit.content: Farmer Fidgit will tell you if your farm is healthy!

train-fill-outline.content: Now, fill in the rest of the outline with pipes

train-fish-food-2.content: Drag the jar over the tank.

train-harvest.content: Tap all the BIG PLANTS to pick them for the farm stand.

train-intro.content: Let's see how to build your farm!

train-meter-alt.content: Here's how many plants you’ve picked.

train-meter.content: Look HERE to see how many plants you’ve picked.

train-pipes-connect.content: Make sure your pipes connect to both sides of the tank, so the water can flow.

train-right-amounts.content: You’ll need just the right amounts of fish and plants for your farm to grow!

train-side-to-side-pipes.content: Only the side-to-side pipes grow plants.

train-success.content: Fabulous farming! Your fish’s poop helped feed the plants, and the plants helped clean the fish’s water.

train-turn-on-water.content: When you’re done building, turn on the water to start growing your plants.

uhoh-not-healthy.content: Uh oh, your farm wasn't healthy.

win-connected-pipes.content: You connected your pipes to the tank, so the water could flow to the fish and plants!

win-fish-enough-food.content: Your fish had enough food to eat!

win-right-amount-fish.content: You had the right amount of fish! The plants were able to use small parts of their poop for food.

pick-eight.content: Pick eight of them for the Fidgits!

pick-fifteen.content: Pick fifteen of them for the Fidgits!

pick-five.content: Pick five of them for the Fidgits!

pick-forty.content: Pick forty of them for the Fidgits!

pick-fortyeight.content: Pick forty-eight of them for the Fidgits!

pick-fortyfive.content: Pick forty-five of them for the Fidgits!

pick-four.content: Pick four of them for the Fidgits!

pick-six.content: Pick six of them for the Fidgits!

pick-ten.content: Pick ten of them for the Fidgits!

pick-thirty.content: Pick thirty of them for the Fidgits!

pick-thirtyfive.content: Pick thirty-five of them for the Fidgits!

pick-three.content: Pick three of them for the Fidgits!

pick-twelve.content: Pick twelve of them for the Fidgits!

pick-twenty.content: Pick twenty of them for the Fidgits!

pick-twentyfive.content: Pick twenty-five of them for the Fidgits!

pick-two.content: Pick two of them for the Fidgits!
